document_data.name: Tharcereli
document_data.mainbody: '''Tharcereli''' was the [[ulitharid]] Creedmaster of the Loretakers Creed of [[Oryndoll]] in [[1370 DR]] and [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Tharcereli had an abiding hunger for knowledge but never shared this knowledge with non-illithids.
document_data.History: Tharcereli was a member of the city's [[Elder Concord]] during the [[Time of Troubles]] and [[Ilsensine]] gave it ''[[tendril rings of Ilsensine]]''. As the leader of the Creed of the Loretakers, Tharcereli was the third most powerful individual of the city, behind only the [[Encephalithid]] and the [[Cephalossk|high cleric]] of Ilsensine.
